description: A comprehensive Agentic KG for Risk Management and Operational Resilience. This KG dynamically generates agents to monitor, simulate, and mitigate risks across financial, cyber, operational, and reputational domains. It integrates blockchain‑audited licensing and decentralized governance to provide transparent, adaptive risk analytics and proactive mitigation strategies.

trainingExamples.input: Simulate risk scenario for supply chain disruption in a multinational corporation.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: Risk score: 78, with suggested mitigation: diversify suppliers and increase inventory buffers.
trainingExamples.description: Training example for supply chain risk simulation.

trainingExamples.input: Assess cyber risk based on recent incident reports.
trainingExamples.expectedOutput: Risk score: 85, with recommended measures: enhance firewall protocols and employee training.

evaluationExamples.input: Evaluate the operational risk of a major IT outage in a global bank.
evaluationExamples.expectedOutput: Risk score: 90, with recommendations for redundancy and rapid response.

finalExamExamples.input: Develop a comprehensive risk mitigation plan for a company facing simultaneous financial, cyber, and operational risks.
finalExamExamples.expectedOutput: Integrated risk mitigation plan with overall risk score below 50 and detailed countermeasures for each risk area.
finalExamExamples.description: Final exam: complete integrated risk mitigation plan.

agents.name: BaseRiskAgent
agents.description: Extracts and standardizes risk-related data from various sources for further analysis.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: FinancialRiskAgent
agents.description: Analyzes financial indicators and market data to assess economic risk.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: CyberRiskAgent
agents.description: Evaluates cybersecurity metrics and incident data to determine cyber risk.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: OperationalRiskAgent
agents.description: Assesses operational risk by analyzing system redundancies and failure probabilities.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

agents.name: DynamicCompositeRiskAgent
agents.description: Dynamically combines outputs from multiple risk agents to produce an integrated risk assessment and mitigation plan.
agents.approvalCriteria: {"effectivenessThreshold": "0.95", "ethicsGuidelines": "Output must be unbiased, fact-based, and comply with internal ethical standards."}

metadata.notes: This Risk Management KG dynamically assesses and mitigates risks across financial, cyber, and operational domains. It uses adaptive agent generation and composite risk assessment, with blockchain‑audited microtransactions ensuring transparent, secure monetization and governance.

pricing.dynamicPricing: Based on risk severity and usage metrics
